title: AI-Enabled Customized Science-Integrated Learning Design Using Digital English Textbooks

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English communication skills and secondary-level science knowledge
context.additional_context: English Learning Linked to Science Curriculum in Digital Device-Based Classroom Environments, Including Multicultural Learners with Relevant Needs

learning_goals: Learners can accurately understand 80% or more (80 out of 100) of English science vocabulary provided through an AI diagnostic assessment, generate a personalized vocabulary proficiency analysis report, and select two of the three customized learning recommendations in the report to implement within one week.
Learners utilize over 80% of personalized science reading materials recommended by adaptive learning systems
Learners produce a 1-minute science presentation video using interactive features (voice recognition, vocabulary prediction) in digital textbooks

resources: Science Field English Reading Materials Database

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
